casebody.data:
East Rome Town Company, plaintiff in error, vs. G. W. Nagle et al., defendants in error. William A. Crutchfield, plaintiff in error, vs. Samuel F. Coleman, defendant in error. Thomas Phipps et al., plaintiffs in error, vs. Hamlin J. Cook & Son et al., defendants in error. The Mayor and City Council of Americus, plaintiff in error, vs. W. W. Barlow, defendant in error.

The discretion of the chancellor, exercised in granting or refusing an injunction, will not be controlled unless manifestly abused,
